full_text:
Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
From
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C) BermanNYSDChambers@nysd.uscourts.gov (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov, Lamine N'DiayeMichael Gredd (b)(6) @att.net
To
Date 2019/08/12 14:33
Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
Attachments: TEXT.htm, 2019_08_12_14_31_06.pdf
Good afternoon,
Attached please find Warden N'Diaye's response to Your Honor's inquiry. Please let us know if you need further information.
Thank you,
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
p: (646)836-(b)(6)
f: (646)836-7665
>>> <BermanNYSDChambers@nysd.uscourts.gov> 8/12/2019 12:47 PM >>>
Please see attached letter from Judge Richard M. Berman.
(See attached file: Aug 12 letter.pdf)
Page 2257
DOJ-OGR-00024194
